Here you can find links to the reference text and other helpful guides and examples.

### Textbook: R for Data Science

[R For Data Science](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/) is a **free** online text by Hadley Wickham and Garrett Grolemund. This is our workshop textbook. We won't use this book chapter by chapter necessarily, but we will base many of our exercises off of this text.

[![](https://d33wubrfki0l68.cloudfront.net/b88ef926a004b0fce72b2526b0b5c4413666a4cb/24a30/cover.png){width=25%}](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/)
